testimonials.testimonialDescription: Dear Mr. Paras Kumar, On behalf of our company, I would like to extend a word thanks to Mr. Paras Kumar, Clo. Corporate Law Firm & Consultant for his services rendered to us pertaining to export outstanding dues of our buyer.
We highly appreciate for the Recovery and Collection services of your company. Our payment Rs 16,00,000/- was on hold for last 1 and half years with Teno n Facility Management India Pvt Ltd.
We highly appreciate for the Recovery and Collection services From “ALN Corporate Debt”. Our payment Rs 7,50,000/- was on hold for last 7 and half years with M/s. Parsvnath Developers Limited.,
We appreciate you for your efforts in Recovery and Collection Services provided to our Company in recovering ou r long outstanding payments of Rs. 1,40,773/

On behalf of our company, I would like to extend a word of thanks to Mr. Paras Kumar C/o Corporate Law Firm & Consultant for his services rendered to us pertaining to loan outstanding dues (bad debts) of our distributors / customers.

I am writing this appreciation letter for the unexpected amazing service. We had PO from M/S XXXXXXX Institute. Located at Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar, Punjab, to advertise few advertisement in the different newspap er.
It was great working with IDCI . We had a very professional environment and I appreciate Mr. Paaras for giving us extra time for development & testing. I am looking forward to work with IDCI again.

I really Appreciate to him for his the technique of the work doing smoothly to the closer directions. Its only happened because of his Good knowledge about legal technicalities.He is more efficient in research and time management. Thank-you for your services !!
My expeerince with this consultat is very good. For last one year we have give many cases and got good results. It maintain time frame.
we appreciate for their prompt action and fast recovery from our long terms bad debts. i hope to keep continue their services and all the best for future recoveries.
